pages.text: Players should venture into the Erebus once they've invested in a trait that grants access to the dimension. Practitioners of BAWLS and SKILLZ must eventually seek the resources of the Erebus to continue their progression.

Level 6 Erebus Biomes$(li)Elysian Fields$(li)Elysian Forest$(li)Fungal Forest$(li)Petrified Forest$(li)Submerged Swamp$(li)Subterranean Savannah$(li)Ulterior Outback$(li)Underground Jungle$(li)Volcanic Desert
